extracted_sections.content: The Question paper is divided into four sections: You're very clever at poking fun at weaklings. Frail crumbling houses, crumbling doors, crumbling rafters, crumbling wood, crumbling bodies, crumbling lives, crumbling hearts - the wind god winnows and crushes them all. He won't do what you tell him. So, come, let's build strong homes, Let's join the doors firmly.
